text: Ruze, ki hamai sumoro [dar mahsar] gird meovarad. On ruz ruzi zijonkore ast va har kas ʙa Alloh taolo imon ovarad va korhoi soista ancom dihad, gunohoni uro meʙaxsad va uro ʙa ʙoƣhoe [az ʙihist] vorid mekunad, ki cujʙorho zeri [daraxtoni] on cori ast; covidona dar on memonand. In komjoʙii ʙuzurg ast
